assurancePackage.title: Assurance Package
assurancePackage.description: Carbon Seal \n Lifetime Warranty on Seal and Motor \n 5 Layers of Safety

learnMore.title: Assurance Package
learnMore.subTitle: Carbon Seal
learnMore.description:
The carbon seal is a critical component that ensures smooth and efficient operation of your lift, providing a barrier against dust, debris, and moisture to protect the internal mechanisms.


﻿With our lifetime warranty, you can have complete confidence in the durability and performance. Whether it's preserving the integrity of your lift's mechanisms or enhancing the longevity of your investment, our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction is unwavering.

learnMore.title: Assurance Package
learnMore.subTitle: Lifetime Warranty on Seal and Motor
learnMore.description:
We prioritize reliability and longevity in our home lifts. That's why we're excited to offer a lifetime warranty for the motors in our home lifts. These motors are the heart of your lift, providing the power and efficiency needed for smooth and reliable operation day after day.


﻿With our lifetime warranty, you can rest assured knowing that your home lift's motors are covered for the duration of its lifetime.

learnMore.title: Assurance Package
learnMore.subTitle: 5 Layers of Safety
learnMore.description:
DID YOU KNOW THAT OUR ELEVATOR’S TECHNOLOGY IS THE SAFEST ON THE PLANET?

1. Automatic Descent:

- Experience peace of mind knowing that in the event of a power outage, our elevator automatically descends to the ground floor. You can simply open the door manually and exit without any technical assistance.

2. Emergency Landing Button:

- Rest assured, our elevator is equipped with an 'Emergency Landing Button' inside and outside the cabin. In case the elevator gets stuck between floors, simply press this button to safely land the elevator on the ground floor.

3. Sure Stop Safety Feature:

- Safety is our top priority. If there's a pneumatic pressure failure or if the lift exceeds the designated speed, our 'Sure Stop' safety feature kicks in. It locks the elevator's car within 2 inches, ensuring your safety at all times.

4. Conventional Lock:

- For added peace of mind, our elevator comes with a conventional lock on the door. In case of an emergency, you can manually unlock the elevator using this feature. Experience unmatched safety and peace of mind with our elevator technology – designed to keep you safe in every situation.

learnMore.title: Door Access - Side A (South
learnMore.description: On the ground floor, Side A (South) offers a customizable door access option for your lift. This means that upon installation, you have the flexibility to configure the lift's door to open towards Side A (South), facilitating convenient entry and exit from the lift on the ground floor. Whether you prefer the door to open towards the left, right, front, or rear, Side A (South) allows you to tailor the door access according to your specific requirements and layout of the lift lobby.

learnMore.title: Door Access - Side B (West)
learnMore.description: Transitioning to the first floor, Side B (West) provides another customizable door access option for your lift. During installation, you can configure the lift's door to open towards Side B (West), ensuring seamless entry and exit from the lift on the first floor. Whether you need the door to open towards a different direction than on the ground floor or align with specific pathways or rooms, Side B (West) offers the flexibility to accommodate your preferences and layout of the first-floor area.

learnMore.title: Door Access - Side C (North)
learnMore.description: As you reach the second floor, Side C (North) introduces yet another customizable door access option for your lift. With Side C (North), you have the freedom to configure the lift's door to open in a direction that best suits your needs on the second floor. Whether it's aligning with different pathways, rooms, or specific areas of activity, Side C (North) ensures that entry and exit from the lift on the second floor are tailored to your convenience and requirements, enhancing the overall usability of the lift.

learnMore.title: Door Access - Side D (East)
learnMore.description: Finally, on the third floor, Side D (East) completes the array of customizable door access options for your lift. With Side D (East), you can configure the lift's door to open towards the desired direction on the third floor, providing seamless entry and exit as per your preferences. Whether you require the door to open towards specific rooms, corridors, or areas of interest on the third floor, Side D (East) ensures that the lift's door access is perfectly aligned with your convenience and requirements, offering a personalized lift experience tailored to each floor's layout

learnMore.title: Right Hinge
learnMore.description: Complementing its counterpart, Our Nibav Lifts also includes a high-quality right hinge. Strategically positioned, it ensures even weight distribution and adapts to various architectural layouts. With advanced safety features and concealed hinges, it guarantees a safe, reliable, and aesthetically pleasing journey for passengers, enhancing the overall ambiance of your lift space.

learnMore.title: Left Hinge
learnMore.description: Nibav Lifts features a high-quality left hinge, ensuring stability and smooth movement between floors. With concealed hinges for a seamless finish, your lift experience is upgraded to a new level of sophistication and elegance.

luxuryPackage.title: Luxury Package
luxuryPackage.description: Zero Visible Screws \n Intermediate Uni cylinder \n Cabin Matched to Shaft Colour

learnMore.title: Luxury Package
learnMore.subTitle: Zero Visible Screws
learnMore.description: Immerse yourself in seamless elegance with our Zero Visible Screws feature. Every aspect of your lift is meticulously crafted to perfection, ensuring a sleek and flawless appearance without any unsightly screws disrupting the aesthetic harmony.

learnMore.title: Luxury Package
learnMore.subTitle: Intermediate Uni cylinder
learnMore.description: Experience smooth and silent operation with our Intermediate Uni Cylinder. Engineered for optimal performance and efficiency, this advanced cylinder design enhances the overall ride quality, providing you with a luxurious lift experience that exceeds expectations.

learnMore.title: Luxury Package
learnMore.subTitle: Cabin Matched to Shaft Colour
learnMore.description: Elevate the visual appeal of your lift with our Cabin Matched to Shaft Colour feature. Seamlessly blend the cabin's design with the shaft's color scheme, creating a cohesive and harmonious look that enhances the overall ambiance of your home.

designerPackage.title: Designer Package
designerPackage.description: Curved Shaft with No Sharp Edges \n Largest Panoramic Cabin \n Flushed Cylinder Joints

learnMore.title: Designer Package
learnMore.subTitle: Curved Shaft with No Sharp Edges
learnMore.description:
With our Curved Shaft with No Sharp Edges, every journey is not just stylish but also safe. Experience peace of mind knowing that your loved ones can move seamlessly throughout your home without worrying about sharp edges.


Indulge in the beauty of a curved design that not only enhances the aesthetics of your space but also reflects your discerning taste and commitment to safety. Elevate your home and your lifestyle with our Designer Package, where luxury meets peace of mind.

learnMore.title: Designer Package
learnMore.subTitle: Largest Panoramic Cabin
learnMore.description: Immerse yourself in a world of expansive vistas with our Largest Panoramic Cabin feature. Crafted with your comfort and safety in mind, our elevators offer breathtaking 360-degree views that transcend claustrophobic feelings. Enjoy a clear view of your home, fostering a sense of security and connectivity for everyone onboard. Additionally, the transparency of our elevators enhances their visual appeal, guaranteeing an exceptional and unforgettable experience for all passengers.

learnMore.title: Designer Package
learnMore.subTitle: Flushed Cylinder Joints
learnMore.description: Flushed Cylinder Joints are a sophisticated component integrated into our vacuum home elevator. Unlike traditional joints that protrude, these joints are meticulously engineered to seamlessly integrate into the elevator structure, providing a sleek and streamlined appearance offering both style and functionality for those seeking a premium home lift solution.

learnMore.title: Built In
learnMore.description:
Our lifts boast a head unit atop the shaft, ensuring ample headroom of 2749mm for a spacious and comfortable ride.


Built with ingenuity, our lifts integrate the motor atop the elevator itself. This sleek design not only saves precious space but also eliminates the need for a separate machine room. With 2749mm headroom and operating at just 62 decibels, our lifts provide a tranquil experience akin to the hush of a library.

learnMore.title: Detached
learnMore.description: Nibav Home Lifts redefine comfort and convenience with our innovative detached headroom design. By positioning the motor away from the shaft, we offer a perfect fit for homes with limited overhead spaces, providing ample headroom of 2449mm (60 decibels) for a tranquil ride akin to the hush of a library. Explore the Nibav difference today.

aesthetics.title: Aesthetics
aesthetics.description:
Aluminium Frameless Landing Door 
 Crome Door Handle 
 Hidden Connector Holes  
 Concealed Door Hinges 
 Painted Metal Ceiling 
 Concealed Sensors 
 Concealed Lock Cover

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Aluminium Frameless Landing Door
learnMore.description: Elevate the visual appeal of your space with our Aluminium Frameless Landing Door, a hallmark of modern elegance and sophistication. The frameless design not only enhances aesthetics but also maximizes natural light flow, creating an open and inviting atmosphere within your home or building. Made from high-quality aluminium, these doors are not only visually stunning but also durable and resistant to corrosion, ensuring long-lasting beauty and functionality.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Crome Door Handle
learnMore.description: Our door handle not only enhances the aesthetic appeal of your elevator but also offers a luxurious feel with every touch. The chrome finish brings a contemporary elegance to any interior design, complementing a wide range of decor styles. Designed for both durability and style, our Chrome Door Handle is built to withstand everyday use while maintaining its stunning appearance for years to come.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Hidden Connector Holes
learnMore.description: Elevate the elegance of your elevator design with our innovative Hidden Connector Holes feature. By seamlessly integrating connectors within the elevator structure, we eliminate unsightly protrusions and create a clean, streamlined appearance. These discreetly placed connector holes ensure a polished finish while maintaining the functionality of your elevator. Experience a refined aesthetic with Hidden Connector Holes, where form meets function seamlessly.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Concealed Door Hinges
learnMore.description: Ingeniously integrated within the door structure, these hinges not only enhance the sleek appearance of your elevator but also contribute to safety by minimizing the risk of scratches and damage. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your elevator's design isn't just visually appealing but also protective of your space.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Painted Metal Ceiling
learnMore.description: Beyond aesthetics, the painted finish provides durability and protection against wear and tear, ensuring long-lasting beauty. Transform your elevator into a stylish and timeless masterpiece with our Painted Metal Ceiling, where every journey becomes a statement of refined taste and elegance.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Concealed Sensors
learnMore.description: Strategically integrated within the elevator structure, these sensors remain hidden from view, maintaining the sleek and uncluttered appearance of your space. Despite their discreet placement, these sensors deliver precise and reliable performance, ensuring smooth operation and enhanced safety without sacrificing style.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Concealed Lock Cover
learnMore.description: Designed to seamlessly blend into the elevator's structure, this cover discreetly conceals the lock mechanism, providing a clean and polished finish. Not only does it contribute to the aesthetic appeal of your space, but it also adds an extra layer of security by safeguarding the lock from tampering or damage.

learnMore.title: Carpet
learnMore.description: Personalize your elevator interior with our range of luxurious carpet options available in Taupe Beige, Scarlet Red, and Ashen Grey. Elevate the ambiance of your space with the rich tones and plush texture of our premium carpets, designed to complement any interior decor style. Whether you prefer the timeless elegance of Taupe Beige, the bold statement of Scarlet Red, or the modern sophistication of Ashen Grey our custom carpet selection allows you to create a truly bespoke elevator experience. Indulge in comfort and style with our exquisite carpet options, making every ride a delight for the senses.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description:
Upgradable Main Board 
 Soundproof 2.0 
 Trip Counter with Ride History 
 Auto Return 
 Fused Locking Technology 
 Precision Levelling System  
 Comfort Landing

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Upgradable Main Board
learnMore.description: Our Upgradable Main Board feature ensures effortless adaptability and sustained performance, safeguarding both users and the board itself. By eliminating all forms of power during upgrades, we prioritize safety, preventing any risk of damage to individuals or the board. This meticulous approach not only enhances user safety but also guarantees the smooth functioning of the cabin. Trust in our commitment to safety and innovation, ensuring your elevator stays ahead of the curve while prioritizing your well-being.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Soundproof 2.0
learnMore.description: Engineered for unparalleled noise reduction, our home lifts provide advanced Soundproofing 2.0 feature, boasting a remarkable noise reduction capability of 62dB. Crafted to create a serene environment, Nibav offer unparalleled quietness, shielding you from disruptive external sounds. With Soundproofing 2.0, experience an upgraded level of peace and privacy during your elevator rides.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Trip Counter with Ride History
learnMore.description: Track every journey effortlessly with our Trip Counter and Ride History feature. Ride History functionality helps in empowering you to monitor elevator activity and identify any irregularities promptly. This provides you with valuable insights into usage patterns and maintenance schedules, ensuring optimal performance and peace of mind. Stay informed and in control with this convenient and transparent functionality.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Auto Return
learnMore.description: Experience unparalleled convenience with our Auto Return feature. When the lift is not in use, the cabin automatically returns to the designated floor, eliminating the need for manual adjustment. With customizable settings, you can personalize where the cabin returns to, ensuring it's always in the most convenient position for you. Say goodbye to the hassle of positioning your elevator

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Fused Locking Technology
learnMore.description: Engineered to provide robust protection, this integrates advanced locking mechanisms, ensuring reliable operation. By fusing multiple locking systems, our home lifts offer redundancy, minimizing the risk of unauthorized access or malfunction. Experience heightened security with Fused Locking Technology, where layers of protection work seamlessly to safeguard your elevator.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Precision Levelling System
learnMore.description: Track every journey effortlessly with our Trip Counter and Ride History feature. Ride History functionality helps in empowering you to monitor elevator activity and identify any irregularities promptly. This provides you with valuable insights into usage patterns and maintenance schedules, ensuring optimal performance and peace of mind. Stay informed and in control with this convenient and transparent functionality.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Comfort Landing
learnMore.description: Crafted with a unique suspension mechanism, Nibav Lifts ensures an exceptionally smooth landing at every floor stop. Our innovative suspension expertly regulates the elevator’s descent, seamlessly aligning with the stopping level to deliver a razor-smooth landing experience. This revolutionary characteristic not only elevates ride quality for passengers but also reduces strain on the elevator’s components, potentially enhancing their longevity.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description:
Child / Senior Friendly 
 Infant Mode 
 Layman Rescue 
 Stationary GSM 
 EEM Ride Check 
 30 Minutes Auxiliary Cabin Power 
 Cabin Door

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Child / Senior Friendly
learnMore.description: With safety as our paramount concern, we have implemented four layers of safety measures that exceed standard requirements. Our elevators are equipped with a switch that gives you control over child safety, allowing you to tailor the elevator's operation to your specific needs. Additionally, we ensure 100% safety by controlling who has access to the lift, providing peace of mind for you and your loved ones. From reduced button heights to handrails positioned for optimal stability, every aspect of our design is meticulously crafted to prioritize safety and comfort for users of all ages.

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Infant Mode
learnMore.description: Infant Mode provides enhanced protection and peace of mind for parents and caregivers. This specialized mode ensures gentle acceleration and deceleration, minimizing any discomfort for infants during elevator rides. Additionally, advanced sensors and safety mechanisms are activated to prevent any unintended movements or disruptions. With Infant Mode, we go above and beyond to create a secure and comfortable environment for your little ones,

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Layman Rescue
learnMore.description: In the rare event of an emergency, this intuitive system allows bystanders or laymen to assist passengers safely and effectively. With clear and simple instructions, Layman Rescue empowers individuals without specialized training to provide assistance, ensuring the well-being of everyone onboard. With Layman Rescue, you can trust in our elevator's ability to prioritize safety in all situations, giving you confidence in your choice for vertical transportation.

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Stationary GSM
learnMore.description: Our Nibav elevators are equipped with Stationary GSM technology. This innovative feature allows for real-time communication and monitoring, even when the elevator is stationary. With Stationary GSM, our elevators remain connected to monitoring systems and support teams, enabling swift response in case of emergencies or technical issues. This advanced technology enhances safety and reliability, providing continuous communication capabilities to ensure the well-being of passengers at all times

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: EEM Ride Check
learnMore.description: EEM Landing Door combines electric, electronic, and mechanical connections to ensure the highest level of safety and reliability. This comprehensive approach covers all potential failure points, both mechanical and electrical, to safeguard passengers at all times. With EEM Ride Check continuously monitoring the elevator's operation and the EEM Landing Door provides robust security, we ensure optimal performance and passenger safety in every ride.

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: 30 Minutes Auxiliary Cabin Power
learnMore.description: Our elevators feature a 30 Minutes Auxiliary Cabin Power system. In the event of a power outage, this ensures that the elevator remains operational for up to 30 minutes, providing passengers with ample time to reach their destination safely. This innovative feature includes an AUX Battery designed to power essential functions such as lighting, ventilation, emergency alarm, and communication systems. Serving as a backup for the main battery. With this comprehensive backup system in place, passengers are guaranteed a secure and comfortable environment inside the cabin, regardless of external circumstances

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Cabin Door
learnMore.description: Nibav elevators employs a combination of advanced sensors and mechanisms to ensure the secure operation of cabin doors at all times. From precise alignment to swift closing, every aspect of our Cabin Door Safety System is meticulously designed to prevent accidents and maintain passenger safety.

learnMore.description: Elevate the elegance of your elevator design with our innovative Hidden Connector Holes feature. By seamlessly integrating connectors within the elevator structure, we eliminate unsightly protrusions and create a clean, streamlined appearance. These discreetly placed connector holes ensure a polished finish while maintaining the functionality of your elevator. Experience a refined aesthetic with Hidden Connector Holes, where form meets function seamlessly.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Concealed Door Hinges
learnMore.description: Ingeniously integrated within the door structure, these hinges not only enhance the sleek appearance of your elevator but also contribute to safety by minimizing the risk of scratches and damage. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your elevator's design isn't just visually appealing but also protective of your space.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Painted Metal Ceiling
learnMore.description: Beyond aesthetics, the painted finish provides durability and protection against wear and tear, ensuring long-lasting beauty. Transform your elevator into a stylish and timeless masterpiece with our Painted Metal Ceiling, where every journey becomes a statement of refined taste and elegance.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Concealed Sensors
learnMore.description: Strategically integrated within the elevator structure, these sensors remain hidden from view, maintaining the sleek and uncluttered appearance of your space. Despite their discreet placement, these sensors deliver precise and reliable performance, ensuring smooth operation and enhanced safety without sacrificing style.

learnMore.title: Aesthetics
learnMore.subTitle: Concealed Lock Cover
learnMore.description: Designed to seamlessly blend into the elevator's structure, this cover discreetly conceals the lock mechanism, providing a clean and polished finish. Not only does it contribute to the aesthetic appeal of your space, but it also adds an extra layer of security by safeguarding the lock from tampering or damage.

learnMore.title: Carpet
learnMore.description: Personalize your elevator interior with our range of luxurious carpet options available in Taupe Beige, Scarlet Red, and Ashen Grey. Elevate the ambiance of your space with the rich tones and plush texture of our premium carpets, designed to complement any interior decor style. Whether you prefer the timeless elegance of Taupe Beige, the bold statement of Scarlet Red, or the modern sophistication of Ashen Grey our custom carpet selection allows you to create a truly bespoke elevator experience. Indulge in comfort and style with our exquisite carpet options, making every ride a delight for the senses.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description:
Upgradable Main Board 
 Soundproof 2.0 
 Trip Counter with Ride History 
 Auto Return 
 Fused Locking Technology 
 Precision Levelling System  
 Comfort Landing

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Upgradable Main Board
learnMore.description: Our Upgradable Main Board feature ensures effortless adaptability and sustained performance, safeguarding both users and the board itself. By eliminating all forms of power during upgrades, we prioritize safety, preventing any risk of damage to individuals or the board. This meticulous approach not only enhances user safety but also guarantees the smooth functioning of the cabin. Trust in our commitment to safety and innovation, ensuring your elevator stays ahead of the curve while prioritizing your well-being.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Soundproof 2.0
learnMore.description: Engineered for unparalleled noise reduction, our home lifts provide advanced Soundproofing 2.0 feature, boasting a remarkable noise reduction capability of 62dB. Crafted to create a serene environment, Nibav offer unparalleled quietness, shielding you from disruptive external sounds. With Soundproofing 2.0, experience an upgraded level of peace and privacy during your elevator rides.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Trip Counter with Ride History
learnMore.description: Track every journey effortlessly with our Trip Counter and Ride History feature. Ride History functionality helps in empowering you to monitor elevator activity and identify any irregularities promptly. This provides you with valuable insights into usage patterns and maintenance schedules, ensuring optimal performance and peace of mind. Stay informed and in control with this convenient and transparent functionality.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Auto Return
learnMore.description: Experience unparalleled convenience with our Auto Return feature. When the lift is not in use, the cabin automatically returns to the designated floor, eliminating the need for manual adjustment. With customizable settings, you can personalize where the cabin returns to, ensuring it's always in the most convenient position for you. Say goodbye to the hassle of positioning your elevator

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Fused Locking Technology
learnMore.description: Engineered to provide robust protection, this integrates advanced locking mechanisms, ensuring reliable operation. By fusing multiple locking systems, our home lifts offer redundancy, minimizing the risk of unauthorized access or malfunction. Experience heightened security with Fused Locking Technology, where layers of protection work seamlessly to safeguard your elevator.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Precision Levelling System
learnMore.description: Track every journey effortlessly with our Trip Counter and Ride History feature. Ride History functionality helps in empowering you to monitor elevator activity and identify any irregularities promptly. This provides you with valuable insights into usage patterns and maintenance schedules, ensuring optimal performance and peace of mind. Stay informed and in control with this convenient and transparent functionality.

learnMore.title: Performance
learnMore.subTitle: Comfort Landing
learnMore.description: Crafted with a unique suspension mechanism, Nibav Lifts ensures an exceptionally smooth landing at every floor stop. Our innovative suspension expertly regulates the elevator’s descent, seamlessly aligning with the stopping level to deliver a razor-smooth landing experience. This revolutionary characteristic not only elevates ride quality for passengers but also reduces strain on the elevator’s components, potentially enhancing their longevity.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description:
Child / Senior Friendly 
 Infant Mode 
 Layman Rescue 
 Stationary GSM 
 EEM Ride Check 
 30 Minutes Auxiliary Cabin Power 
 Cabin Door

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Child / Senior Friendly
learnMore.description: With safety as our paramount concern, we have implemented four layers of safety measures that exceed standard requirements. Our elevators are equipped with a switch that gives you control over child safety, allowing you to tailor the elevator's operation to your specific needs. Additionally, we ensure 100% safety by controlling who has access to the lift, providing peace of mind for you and your loved ones. From reduced button heights to handrails positioned for optimal stability, every aspect of our design is meticulously crafted to prioritize safety and comfort for users of all ages.

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Infant Mode
learnMore.description: Infant Mode provides enhanced protection and peace of mind for parents and caregivers. This specialized mode ensures gentle acceleration and deceleration, minimizing any discomfort for infants during elevator rides. Additionally, advanced sensors and safety mechanisms are activated to prevent any unintended movements or disruptions. With Infant Mode, we go above and beyond to create a secure and comfortable environment for your little ones,

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Layman Rescue
learnMore.description: In the rare event of an emergency, this intuitive system allows bystanders or laymen to assist passengers safely and effectively. With clear and simple instructions, Layman Rescue empowers individuals without specialized training to provide assistance, ensuring the well-being of everyone onboard. With Layman Rescue, you can trust in our elevator's ability to prioritize safety in all situations, giving you confidence in your choice for vertical transportation.

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Stationary GSM
learnMore.description: Our Nibav elevators are equipped with Stationary GSM technology. This innovative feature allows for real-time communication and monitoring, even when the elevator is stationary. With Stationary GSM, our elevators remain connected to monitoring systems and support teams, enabling swift response in case of emergencies or technical issues. This advanced technology enhances safety and reliability, providing continuous communication capabilities to ensure the well-being of passengers at all times

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: EEM Ride Check
learnMore.description: EEM Landing Door combines electric, electronic, and mechanical connections to ensure the highest level of safety and reliability. This comprehensive approach covers all potential failure points, both mechanical and electrical, to safeguard passengers at all times. With EEM Ride Check continuously monitoring the elevator's operation and the EEM Landing Door provides robust security, we ensure optimal performance and passenger safety in every ride.

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: 30 Minutes Auxiliary Cabin Power
learnMore.description: Our elevators feature a 30 Minutes Auxiliary Cabin Power system. In the event of a power outage, this ensures that the elevator remains operational for up to 30 minutes, providing passengers with ample time to reach their destination safely. This innovative feature includes an AUX Battery designed to power essential functions such as lighting, ventilation, emergency alarm, and communication systems. Serving as a backup for the main battery. With this comprehensive backup system in place, passengers are guaranteed a secure and comfortable environment inside the cabin, regardless of external circumstances

learnMore.title: Safety
learnMore.subTitle: Cabin Door
learnMore.description: Nibav elevators employs a combination of advanced sensors and mechanisms to ensure the secure operation of cabin doors at all times. From precise alignment to swift closing, every aspect of our Cabin Door Safety System is meticulously designed to prevent accidents and maintain passenger safety.
